choices: Alternate story with the main character as a woman
1.content: You are Matt, a 5'10" 230lbs (muscular) 20 something bachelor who has come into a vast fortune. Since hitting puberty you have been interested in feederism as you have always had a thing for large women. So you put your money to use, you bought a massive plot of land to build a compound on to house yourself and a harem of women. Now to start the story, but how did you find these lovely ladies?
1.title: The beginning...

11.content: What size women were you looking for?
11.title: Willing feedees found online

choices: In bed with your favorite ladies
Speaking to a new person that wants to join the community
14.content:
Having always rejected the idea of fat women being ugly you decided to start a self reliant community within the walls that rewarded gluttonous women. Having started with a small group of women then recruited others to help work the farmland (including men). The community had grown to around 100 people.

         Your day is spent making rounds to make sure the work that needs to be done gets done but also keeping your people happy. Now, where should we start?
14.title: Cult of Gluttony

choices: Another alternative story with the main character being a woman on the compound
15.content: You are Nikki, a 5'8" 170lbs curvaceous woman in her 20s. Since hitting puberty you have been interested in feederism as you have always had a thing for large women. So you put your money to use, you bought a massive plot of land to build a compound on to house yourself and a harem of women. Now to start the story, but how did you find these lovely ladies?
15.title: Alternate story with the main character as a woman

151.title: Willing feedees you found online

1551.title: Matt's feedee

info.brief_description: A young man comes into a fortune and decides to live out his dreams...
info.description: This is a story about a young man who comes into a vast fortune of money and buys up a large plot of land to build a feederism compound on. Only female weight gain is allowed in this story, no piss or scat stuff please. It can stay more realistic or go into more of a fantasy (magic or scientific inventions such as growth rays or whatever you can think of). Sex is ok, but no bringing in characters under 18, this is an adult story.
